source_reference.text: Best Christian Marriage Advice Ever # Shorts (Video by DrKennethAcha)

content_summary:
#Shorts
What would you say if someone asked you for the best marriage advice ever in less than 50 seconds? That's what I address in this video. I will give you the best marriage advice ever in less than 50 seconds but it will take you an entire lifetime to implement it. It's a daily walk, but the focus must always be on God's kingdom and his righteousness. You want to get before God and hear him say, Good and Faithful Servants (to you and your spouse)!

SUBSCRIBE TO THIS CHANNEL!
